item.title: Init
item.description: Linux Init linux系统启动的第一个进程,pid=1的进程. $ ls -l /sbin/init $ sudo readlink /sbin/init /sbin/init -> upstart /sbin/init -> /lib/systemd/systemd /etc/init.d The directory containing System V init scripts. 通过service命令操作 /etc/init The directory containing upstart jobs. 通过
